summary: 17 CFR § 240.14a-9 prohibits false or misleading statements in any proxy solicitation materials, emphasizing the need for accuracy regarding material facts. It clarifies that SEC filing or review does not imply endorsement or accuracy of the materials. Additionally, it restricts nominees and shareholders from including misleading information in proxy materials or related communications.
